General.Name: Langfang Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Langfang Development Co., Ltd. provides electronic products and network technology services in China. The company also offers heating and steam services for residents, and commercial and industrial users; real estate consulting; business management consulting; and interior decoration and design services, as well as develops and operates real estate properties. In addition, it manufactures refrigeration and air-conditioning equipment, as well as engages in planning, design, construction, and operation of thermal systems. The company was formerly known as C&T Technology Development CO., LTD and changed its name to Langfang Development Co., Ltd. Langfang Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Langfang, China.

3.Name: Mr. Chun Ling  Zhang
3.Title: Sec. of the Board & Staff Director
